description: Santa's Quick List is designed for the shopper to keep track of gift ideas, stores and the people they are responsible for. The List is simple. Enter a person and the associated gifts and stores. Then you get to choose where they are on the Naughty or Nice scale. Varying degrees are used to help prioritize the list and have a little fun. Entries can be sorted alphabetically, by the Naughty / Nice rating scale or by  the Completed or Still Shopping value. Alternatively, you can use the list for returns or to keep track of gifts you receive and who gave them as well! Fun and simple to use. Convenient countdown to Christmas displays in the top header to remind you how many shopping days are left.
